name: Irenna
motivation: Protect the innocent and expose corruption.
playerhint:
Irenna uses her puppet shows to expose truths. To help her unmask the High Judge, she might require a Puppet String Spool for a special performance or to send a message.
Dialogue Hooks:
dialogue_hooks:
"The little ones know more than you think — they just talk with string and wood."
"Every play I perform is a truth they can't imprison."
veil_connection:
Her puppet shows move on their own;
orphan children may be Veil-touched.
